documents.document: Most mobsters are ruthless, but others are as 'ruthless' as a litter of sleepy kittens
#Irony: When beloved anthems endure like the most hateful grudges. #Beloved=#Hateful #Anthem=#Grudge
Most plots are convoluted, but others are as 'convoluted' as Sesame Street
Humanist. noun. A dissenter who would rather promote rejected rationalism than rejected heresies. #Humanist=#Dissenter
What if a world with more censors is a world with less pornography since censors embrace the censorship that suppresses pornography? #Censor
Meek dreamers like Walter Mitty put me in mind of wusses: they're as meek as a mouse
Strong is the force in unshaven tramps if pity they reject. Buy surfboards, they will. Smooth surfers will they be. #ThingsYodaNeverSaid
Most heroes like Popeye are brave, but others are as 'brave' as hiding in a cave for 5 years
An alchemist calling himself @technology_pioneer writes "Last night I dreamt I was a scientific chemist conducting research."
Here RESEARCH = KNOWLEDGE, @technology_pioneer. Knowledge is accumulated by unscientific alchemists. Are you scientific or unscientific?
Would you rather be: 1. A preceptor teaching an honored principle? 2. A craftsman teaching a lowly apprentice? #Preceptor=#Craftsman
Poetic wanderers like Lord Byron put me in mind of allusions: they're as poetic as Romeo's final words
Not all nobodies are unremarkable, just as not every supermodel is provocative. The Venn don't lie #MenOfVenn https://t.co/NFh5n58hpt
Most masks are opaque, but others are as 'opaque' as the photosphere
Nomad. noun. A mobile cross of 1 part herd-tending herder to 1 part camel-riding bedouin. #Nomad=#Bedouin #Nomad=#Herder
#Irony is when you 🕘. Succumb to vice 💒. Marry a dumb gambler nicknamed "the moose" 🕑. Play dumb cards 💩. Get dumped for acting like a fool https://t.co/QJcte72gNZ
What if a 🐷, who thought it was Osama Bin Laden, rebelled against a 🐜 who thought it was Alexander the Great?
Osama the 🐷 lobbied hard for a plum appointment. #OsamaBinLaden=#AlexandertheGreat
🐜📜💬👉🐷🆙 (or: 🐷 was appointed by 🐜) So at first, Alexander the 🐜 secured a plum appointment for Osama the 🐷.
🐜👟💢⚽➡🐷 (or: 🐜 delegated to 🐷) So Alexander the 🐜 delegated responsibility to Osama the 🐷.
🐜💬🐷🚹➡☠ (or: 🐷 killed for 🐜) Then Osama the over-zealous 🐷 carried out assassinations for Alexander the 🐜.
🐜👉⏩🚫🐷😵 (or: 🐷 was pushed too far by 🐜) But Alexander the ruthless 🐜 made excessive demands of Osama the 🐷.
So Osama the 🐷 was paid by Alexander the 🐜 for plotting terrorist outrages and he failed to deliver
Well, Alexander the 🐜 humiliated Osama the 🐷 by saying the maniacal 🐷 was as murderous and homicidal as The Joker
🐷😤✊🆚🐜 (or: 🐷 rebelled against 🐜) So Osama the 🐷 rebelled openly against Alexander the 🐜.
But Osama the 🐷 underestimated Alexander the strategic 🐜's talent for recruiting disaffected youths
🐜➡🐷😳😶😵 (or: 🐷 was overwhelmed by 🐜) So Alexander the 🐜 overwhelmed Osama the 🐷 with its unstoppable might.
🐜📢🤐🐷 (or: 🐷 was suppressed by 🐜) Then Alexander the 🐜 suppressed all mutterings and criticism by Osama the 🐷.
So Osama the 🐷 bowed down to Alexander the 🐜 as the undisputed king of building empires
But in the end Alexander the megalomaniacal 🐜 banished Osama the 🐷, shouting "Never come back to Alexandria"
Osama the 🐷's name was never dropped in Alexander the 🐜's presence again. The End
Most machines are immaculate, but others are as 'immaculate' as Monica Lewinsky
One does not simply wake up one day and receive a scholarship. #ThingsBoromirNeverSaid #CareerAdvice
If you are a would-be academic that isn't willing to do what you must to earn a scholarship, you may as well be denied a grant right now.
Bald tyrants like Ming The Merciless put me in mind of onions: they're as bald as an egg
🕘. Suffer from misfortune 🕛. Become a wretch 🕑. Suffer from dangerous plights 🕞. Get called "The Thrill seeker" by less-dangerous wretches https://t.co/8UQ8SkywwG
Unstable footballers like Luis Suarez put me in mind of psychotics: they're as unstable as Iraq
I painted this picture of #KobeBryant's innermost soul using agile Daredevil-red, fast fox-red and egotistical Trump-orange. #KobeBryantRGB https://t.co/rmp1qk7RFk
Most slaughterhouses are ferocious, but others are as 'ferocious' as a chihuahua
Priest. noun. 1. One who believes doctrines. 2. One who combines an imam's holiness with a yogi's spirituality. #Priest=#Yogi #Priest=#Imam
#Crudeness is when you: 🤔. Embrace rationality 😏. Become a philosopher 😥. Create crude metaphors 😣. Turn into a harlot #CrudeVenn https://t.co/jcguluUvol
Most headlines are noticeable, but others are as 'noticeable' as a fart in the wind
A fearless lion once sought fame. Along came a beautiful racehorse who thought "A poet like me needs a hero like this for my ideals."
"The best heroes are uncomplicated heroes," thought the beautiful racehorse So this poet decided to cherish an ideal about the fearless lion
Vicious bullies like Eric Cartman put me in mind of savages: they're as vicious as a velociraptor
You can practice the rudest comedy and still call yourself a charismatic comedian. #Comedy=#Mockery #Comedian=#Mocker
But practice any kind of mockery and people dismiss you as a rude mocker. #Comedy=#Mockery #Comedian=#Mocker
Most skyscrapers are concrete, but others are as 'concrete' as wet jelly in a blast furnace
I came, I saw, I pistol-whipped them all with #SnakePlissken's MAC-10 with sound suppressor (Suggested epitaph for #KurtRussell)
Blessed are the dominant bosses that close businesses, for they shall curry favor with masters and become inferior lackeys #GospelOfVenn https://t.co/lYrnTFLBJW
Most explorers like Indiana Jones are indomitable, but others are as 'indomitable' as a new born kitten
You can wear the raggedest crowns and still call yourself an eminent queen. #Crown=#Rag #Queen=#Bum
But wear even one rag and people dismiss you as an unimpressive bum. #Crown=#Rag #Queen=#Bum
Most names are identifiable, but others are as 'identifiable' as a snowflake in a blizzard
How might a strong knight become a spineless sycophant? #Knight=#Sycophant
What if strong knights were to retreat from their battlefields, suck up to elites and become spineless sycophants? #Knight=#Sycophant
🕘. Succumb to corruption 🕛. Become a liberal sinner 🕑. Embrace liberality as a lefty 🕞. Renounce corruption 🕔. Renounce liberality https://t.co/06eZQBvq1P
Most flashbacks are revealing, but others are as 'revealing' as the exposed part of an iceberg
What if #OnHerMajestysSecretService were real? #DavyCrockett could be its #JamesBond: adventurous and patriotic, yet unrefined too
Brainwashed actors like Tom Cruise put me in mind of assassins: they're as brainwashed as the Branch Davidians
To some hunters, hunting is a determined threat. To others, it is an incoherent nightmare. #Hunting=#Threat #Hunting=#Nightmare
Whinger. noun. A blend of 1 part spleen-venting grumbler to 1 part grievance-expressing begrudger. #Whinger=#Begrudger #Whinger=#Grumbler
Most machines are accurate, but others are as 'accurate' as the local weatherman
Not all cheerleaders are happy. Some are as distressed as the most miserable refugee. Which are you? #Cheerleader=#Refugee?
Most tragedies are shocking, but others are as 'shocking' as a convent whisper
To some queens, security is a sublime luxury. To others, it is a ridiculous fiasco. #Security=#Luxury #Security=#Fiasco
What if a world with more rebels is a world with less cuts since rebels campaign against the governments that make cuts? #Rebel
Prolific businessmen like Thomas Edison put me in mind of entrepreneurs: they're as prolific as rabbits
Sculptor. noun. A visual fusion of 1 part style-popularizing player to 1 part hammer-using workman. #Sculptor=#Workman #Sculptor=#Player
Most novelists like Virginia Woolf are literary, but others are as 'literary' as Mike Tyson
#Irony is when you 🕘. Embrace stupidity 💒. Marry a lewd joker nicknamed "the baboon" 🕑. Tell lewd gags 💩. Get dumped for acting like a freak https://t.co/zMveTbsUto
Most infinities are distant, but others are as 'distant' as a first cousin
Strong is the force in lowly lackeys if the ringleader they disappoint. Embrace nationalism, they will. Celebrated patriots will they be. https://t.co/nx35BXzdZc
Most treasures are appreciated, but others are as 'appreciated' as telemarketing calls to my cellphone
To some gourmets, food is a generous friend. To others, it is a cheap bargain. #Food=#Friend #Food=#Bargain
#Irony: Poetesses spreading promising ideas about inauspicious loss. #Promising=#Inauspicious #IdeaAboutLoss
Fashionable wives like Michelle Obama put me in mind of trendsetters: they're as fashionable as a plastic raincoat
Have you heard about the firefighter who obtained his wings, became an angel and went from carrying rubbery hoses to carrying rigid swords?
Most togas are snooty, but others are as 'snooty' as Arkansas
🕘. Win the title 🕛. Become a champion 🕑. Seduce the "title of king" 🕞. Become a courtesan 🕔. Lose your title #KingTitleVenn https://t.co/w428yrtVTF
A savage buffalo once lost its humanity. A vicious poodle then thought "A tyrant like me needs a victim like this for my atrocities."
"For the best victims are filthy beasts," thought the vicious poodle. So this tyrant decided to commit an atrocity on the savage buffalo.
Most books are lengthy, but others are as 'lengthy' as a matchstick
Last night I dreamt I was reading the news with #RonBurgundy when we were melted with a rocket-fuel Molotov cocktail by #NeilArmstrong
I guess #NeilArmstrong and #RonBurgundy represent warring parts of my personality: the humble vs. pretentious sides. #Humble=#Pretentious
Friendly magicians like Ron Weasley put me in mind of puppies: they're as friendly as a doormat
A murderer calling himself @poet_saint writes "Last night I dreamt I was a conscientious martyr seeking a glory." #Murderer=#Martyr
Here GLORY = DEATH, @poet_saint. Deaths are something conscienceless murderers profit from. Are you conscientious or conscienceless?
#Charm is when you: 🤔. Earn trust 😏. Become a confidante 😥. Develop some charming familiarity 😣. Turn into a swindler #CharmingVenn https://t.co/HyyVu4XFdM
Most prions are infectious, but others are as 'infectious' as tap water
Blessed are the vigorous revolutionaries that negotiate the government, for they shall be wrapped in bandages and become dead mummies https://t.co/4BEuV6VVrV
Glamorous con men like Jay Gatsby put me in mind of brides: they're as glamorous as modeling
What if a world with more gunmen is a world with more stores since gunmen buy the guns that protect the ships that contain stores? #Gunman
Sleuth: A hardened cop, relying on a cop's intuition. #Sleuth=#Cop
Most labradors are lovable, but others are as 'lovable' as a sharp rock
What if #TheFlintstones were about #AmericanPolitics? #JohnMcCain could be its #FredFlintstone: quick-tempered and impatient, yet straightforward too.
If #JohnMcCain is #FredFlintstone in a staid suit, who in #AmericanPolitics is #BlowhardSandstone most like? #TheFlintstones
Trivial actors like Jerry Seinfeld put me in mind of potatoes: they're as trivial as eating breakfast
🕘. Study law 🕛. Be appointed by the "court of law" 🕑. Act like a jester, not a solicitor 🕞. Be banished from court 🕔. Retire from the law https://t.co/l8Oqg1Xj1m
